parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. Default value: **app-1000000**. If you have activated the multi-application service, specify the ID of the application to add the watermark template in the specified application. For more information, see [Overview](~~113600~~).

parameters.name: FileUrl
parameters.description:
The URL of the watermark file. The URL must be an Object Storage Service (OSS) URL and cannot contain the information used for URL signing.

> *   This parameter is required if you set `Type` to `Image`.
> *  You can obtain the URL from the `FileURL` parameter in the response to the [CreateUploadAttachedMedia](~~CreateUploadAttachedMedia~~) operation that you call to upload the watermark image to ApsaraVideo VOD.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the watermark template.

*   Only letters and digits are supported.
*   The name cannot exceed 128 bytes.
*   The value must be encoded in UTF-8.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the watermark template. Valid values:

*   **Image** (default): image watermark template
*   **Text**: text watermark template

parameters.name: WatermarkConfig
parameters.description: The configuration information of the watermark such as the display position and special effects. The value must be a JSON string. The configuration parameters for image and text watermarks are different. For more information about the parameter structure, see [WatermarkConfig](~~98618#section-h01-44s-2lr~~).
